title: How to Simplify Adding Butter to Pastry Dishes

steps.headline: Put the butter into the freezer for at least half an hour.
Put the grater over the bowl.
Start grating the butter.
steps.description: It is probably good to use the largest surface area of the grater.

steps.headline: Start cutting it into your pastry.

text: Refrigerate the bowl.  Put the butter into the freezer for at least half an hour.  Put the grater over the bowl.  Start grating the butter. It is probably good to use the largest surface area of the grater. Start cutting it into your pastry.  Refrigerate after grating, if necessary.
